JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: HVAC Engineer for Offshore Wind Farm Projects, Esbjerg or Ballerup, Denmark
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have interest and experience within HVAC (Heating Ventilation and Air Conditioning) system design and want to be part of the world’s transition towards a greener future? – then this could be an opportunity for you.

At Semco Maritime, you will joining an experienced and highly skilled team in our Renewable division who has created one of the largest project portfolios within offshore substations and have activities in Europe, Asia and the USA.

The position

As HVAC Engineer, you will be involved in greenfield EPCI (Engineering, Procurement, Construction and Installation) contracts for offshore substation projects, where results are created together based on a high level of teamwork, professionalism and dedication. Knowledge and understanding of all discipline areas within HVAC system is requisite - Mechanical, Electrical and Control.

You may choose between working from our head office in Esbjerg or from our Ballerup office, whatever is the most convenient location for you.

Key responsibilities and tasks

  • Managing the project team for the HVAC system
  • Responsible for the cost, hours and quality for the HVAC system within a project
  • Clarify client requirement within tender and project phase
  • Produce and be responsible for design solution, documentation and purchase together with our procurement department
  • Problem solving with a solutionoriented mindset
  • Attending factory tests, site tests and handover of projects to clients and their O&M organisations
  • Support to the site during construction and commissioning
  • Part of engineering studies and provide technical solutions, clarifications and specifications
  • Participation in concept development and optimization of technical solutions

Your profile

You hold a Bachelor or Master of Science in mechanical engineering, Marine engineering or another relevant background. Good technical leading skills, knowledge and experience in ventilation systems, direct expansion and water-based cooling system. Experience in EPC project execution or/and in offshore industry is preferred. Besides, you believe that success is only achieved through dedicated teamwork.

Have we caught your interest?

Fantastic! Please submit your application via the link below. If you have any questions regarding the position please contact Mikkel Stephansen, HR Business Partner, at +45 2127 5283 or Torben Vestergaard, Manager Mechanical Systems +45 7916 6150.

See the vacancy and apply online:

https://semcomaritime.career.emply.com/ad/hvac-engineer-for-offshore-wind-farm-projects/kd1iub/en 

as soon as possible.

We look forward to hearing from you!

 

Semco Maritime is an international engineering and contracting company dedicated to projects in the energy sector. For 40 years, we have been facilitating design, fabrication, service and maintenance of our customers’ assets, providing comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects. From turnkey engineering solutions to outsourcing of manpower and delivery of components, systems and solutions – we make sure our customers and partners in the energy sector experience safe and cost-efficient solutions. Semco Maritime has approx. 1,700 employees and branches in Denmark, Norway, United Kingdom, Germany, Singapore and the US.

For further information, please see www.semcomaritime.com
